name: LightHero
description:
LightHero:

Platformer

Player 1 Controls: Arrow Keys

Don't touch the colour Red

Get to the Diamond!

To go over walls double jump (Up arrow key click twice.)

Songs:

Just click a song you want to listen to!

Ping Pong:

Use your mouse to control the green paddle and don't let anything touch the bottom where the red line is!

Tank Game (Two Player):

Player 1 Controls: Up and Down Arrow to move, Left Arrow to shoot

Player 2 Controls: W and S to move, D to shoot

Try to shoot your opponents tank with your tank!
